tweets.text: The air purifiers have started to go out to people in need. @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency  Look at this poor woman's eyes! This cannot be allowed to go on. Hang your heads in shame #capitoff #stopthestink https://t.co/g7kUIqLdzd

New investigation - @EnvAgency (body in charge of monitoring chemical pollution in England) has pension funds with millions of pounds invested in agrochemical giants that make toxic pesticides (including some that are banned in UK) #divest https://t.co/NTgPkLzblb

Fangtastic news! Brown Long-eared #Bats are roosting in the loft at our #Kelvedon officeü¶á

As they hadn‚Äôt yet gone into hibernation, when we discovered them back in November, we were able to take some pics.

They‚Äôre believed to be a maternity roost, so we could see some pupsüòç https://t.co/oHSePdB1fa

The most upsetting thing about the stink caused by the money grabbing bastards, Red Industries? On the times our home doesn‚Äôt smell like ass, eggs and chemical it‚Äôs a lovely family home...that we are slowly being poisoned in. #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL

At Health Questions I asked @MattHancock about the public health implications of the breaches at Walley's Quarry.

I know, from both the local GPs and those writing to me, that many residents are concerned for their health, both physically and mentally. @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/pwh6zUI4Zs

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Please someone help. My 2 granddaughters 2 and 4 woken up by the smell coughing and being sick today. This is a scandal and no one is listening and seem reluctant to do anything!  Why?!  Is there a fear of Red Industries?

Anyone know why builders at Mitcham Bridge are dumping waste into the River Wandle? I recorded this today at 3:15. #wandle @EnvAgencySE  @EnvAgency @riverlevel_2135 @Merton_Council https://t.co/czmoLpKGHd
@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @BBCPanorama Wolstanton is horrendous today

urls.title: Petition: Ban Water Companies discharging raw sewage into water courses.
urls.description: Ensure Water companies treat the sewage they are responsible for. Not discharge it into rivers and water courses. After all what goes into the ocean comes back as the fish we eat.

tweets.text: Please share with your members, let‚Äôs keep our rivers clean. @NOAAFish_NWFSC @NWFishEA @NWF  @EnvAgencySE  @EnvAgency @JoeFishingEA @EnvAgencyMids  https://t.co/Jc7ojJO1Kz

@samroyle11 @StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Same here - had none with my first! Granted every pregnancy is different but my 24 hour sickness went at about 19 weeks and now I‚Äôm only sick when the stench is in the house. There‚Äôs a link somewhere!

@njbrough88 @StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Oh gosh how scary, glad you‚Äôre getting on ok now! My sickness is much worse this time than with my first, I can‚Äôt say it‚Äôs definitely the smell, but it doesn‚Äôt help!

@samroyle11 @StinkStopthe @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Congratulations! And sorry you‚Äôre having to deal with all of this - let alone pregnant! We nearly lost ours 6+ times early on and always the Monday after a bad weekend with the smell. Made it to 27 weeks now thank god but the sickness that comes when it‚Äôs bad is shocking!
@AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids The mental health of your constituents ...

tweets.text: @MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency Nick, I live 2 miles from this Landfill and right now a foul odour is coming in to my house despite all windows & doors being firmly shut. The owners are notorious for silencing complaints through legal action they even complained about the MP getting involved to the Tory party!
